channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: how do i change my exp rate...like when you attack a dummy, door, or haystack how do i make it give more exp?

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

First, search, in client.java

if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || playerXP[skill]

Then after it you should see how much exp it gives you. Heres an example of mine:

if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || playerXP[skill] > 2000000000) {

My server therefore gives,2000000000 exp each time you train.

So change the numbers that you see.

Read full topic
